biotools.summary: The aim of BTEVAL server is to evaluate beta turn prediction algorithms on a uniform data set of 426 proteins or subsets of these proteins. It is the new data set in which no two protein chains have more that 25% sequence identity and each chain contains minimum one beta turn.

bioschemas.name: BTEVAL
bioschemas.summary: The aim of BTEVAL server is to evaluate beta turn prediction algorithms on a uniform data set of 426 proteins or subsets of these proteins. It is the new data set in which no two protein chains have more that 25% sequence identity and each chain contains minimum one beta turn.
